page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RACHAEL
page.content: Saturday is a special day because I go to French lessons. When I'm there, my mummy is in town, and my little sister Sarah is at Tap or Ballet dancing. Daddy wil be washing his new car. Grandad will be cuddling our black cat with the white blob on the end of his tail. His name is Jason. I like to play with my friend Wendy on a Saturday as well. We like to play with the cat, when we are in the mood for it. For dinner we have chicken and chips. Saturday night s good for the television. I like the Terry and June programme and also Only Fools and Horses, Juliet Bravo and the Noel Edwards Late Late Breakfast Show, also a couple of other programmes.
